verses.text: Mamin Jehová, manh in a tumej yet' yoval a k'ool. Manh ak' in yaelal ayic scot oval t'ayin.
Mamin, ok'oc val a k'ool t'ayin, yujto manhxalaj vip svab'i. Mamin, ak'xi b'ox in k'ool yujto a in nivanil tik sluclon yuj manh ipal.
Te somchajnac in k'ool. Ha achxo Mamin Jehová, ¿b'aq'uinh ol ach och ved'oc?
Mamin Jehová, ochanh val q'uelan t'ayin, colinel yet' val a niwan wach'k'olal.
¿Tom ay mach olto ach naancotoc ayic toxo ix chami? Malaj junok mach ol b'itan t'ayach t'a skal eb' yetchamnaquil chi'.
Ste el vip voq'ui. Manh jantacoc vok' t'a junjun ak'val. Sch'ayxiel in k'anh jolom yuj yal in sat.
Maxtzac yal-laj vilani, yujto ix mal in sat voq'ui yujnhej eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin.
Elanhec t'a in tz'ey a ex to anhej chukal tze k'ulej. Toxo ix yab' Jehová in sik'sik'an voq'ui.
Toxo ix yab' in tevi t'ay. Toxo ix scha in lesal.
Ha eb' ayoch ajk'olal t'ayin, ol kan eb' t'a q'uixvelal. Tonhej ol somchajcanel eb'. D'a junnhej mutz'satil ol kan eb' t'a q'uixvelk'olal.
